<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3087</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cinderella around the world</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aschenputtel um die Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cendrillon autour du monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cinderella em torno do mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cinderella intorno al mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Cinderella σε όλο τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cinderella alrededor del mundo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a treasure hunt activity where the students read folktales about Cinderella in different countries around the world and recognize her different identities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fairy tales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Schatzjagdaktivität, in der die 
Kursteilnehmer folktales über Aschenputtel in den unterschiedlichen 
Ländern um die Welt lesen und ihre unterschiedlichen Identitäten 
erkennen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité de chasse à trésor où les 
étudiants lisent des folktales au sujet de Cendrillon dans 
différents pays autour du monde et identifient ses différentes 
identités.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade da caça do tesouro onde os
estudantes leiam folktales sobre Cinderella em países diferentes em 
torno do mundo e reconheçam suas identidades diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un tesoro cerca l'attività 
dove gli allievi leggono i folktales circa Cinderella in paesi 
differenti intorno al mondo e riconoscono le sue identità differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα κυνηγιού θησαυρών όπου 
οι σπουδαστές διαβάζουν folktales για Cinderella στις 
διαφορετικές χώρες σε όλο τον κόσμο και αναγνωρίζουν τις 
διαφορετικές ταυτότητές της.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad de la caza del tesoro donde
los estudiantes leen folktales sobre Cinderella en diversos países 
alrededor del mundo y reconocen sus diversas identidades.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fairy Geschichten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">contes de fées</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tales fairy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">racconti fairy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορίες νεράιδων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">cuentos de hadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
